title: NATO member rejects new Ukraine weapons plan
description: Italy has said it would be premature to join NATO’s arms for Ukraine initiative amid ongoing peace talks Read Full Article at RT.com
content:
Italy will not join the NATO initiative to buy US weapons for Ukraine while peace negotiations are underway, Foreign Minister Antonio Tajani has said.
